Summary: Ball with only a red light that went from south to north over are heads.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Victoria
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswe were on my patio watching the storms looking west when I turn and looked south when I saw what I thought was a flare or firework but it didnt blow up. it was red and started comeing toward us,I thought maybe a baloon with a light on it but it was to windy and it would have been to crazy of a flight partern. We didnt know wtf it was it flew straight and level in that wind and when it got close just about above my garage I heald at it and the red light turned a little my way then back and went past us. when it passed us we didnt see the red light any more, it look like a gray ball. We watched it go out over the lake and over the park and lost it in the sky.
